tool_description: Searches a comprehensive database of educational activities based on specified criteria including age range, learning domains, and activity types.

min_age_months.description: Minimum age in months for activities (6-216)

max_age_months.description: Maximum age in months for activities (6-216)

learning_domains.description: Target learning domains: cognitive, physical, social, emotional, language, creative

activity_types.description: Types of activities: crafts, games, experiments, reading, outdoor, music, movement

indoor_outdoor.description: Location preference: indoor, outdoor, or both

max_results.description: Maximum number of activities to return (1-100)

error_messages: Invalid age range: min_age_months must be less than or equal to max_age_months, both between 6-216.
Invalid learning domain: Use domains from [cognitive, physical, social, emotional, language, creative].
Invalid activity type: Use types from [crafts, games, experiments, reading, outdoor, music, movement].
Invalid duration: duration_minutes must be between 5 and 180 minutes.
Invalid location: indoor_outdoor must be one of [indoor, outdoor, both].
Invalid result limit: max_results must be between 1 and 100.
usage: Specify age range (min_age_months, max_age_months) to search for appropriate activities. Optionally filter by learning domains, activity types, duration, location, and result limit.

total_found.description: Total number of activities matching the search criteria

activity_titles.description: Array of activity titles corresponding to the IDs

search_summary.description: Summary of search parameters and results
